articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects Command of KPA Navy
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects Command of KPA Navy
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Workers' Party of Korea, state and army of the DPRK, inspected the Command of Combined Unit 597 of the KPA Navy and its units.
					 He inspected Unit 790 of the KPA Navy honored with the title of O Jung Hup-led Seventh Regiment.
					
					 He gave the navymen of the unit a pair of binoculars and an automatic rifle as souvenirs and had a picture taken with them.
					
					He went round the room for education in the revolutionary history, the room devoted to the history of the unit, the warship honored with the field inspection made by President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and the monument to their revolutionary activities.
					
					 He got aboard a warship at anchor at a port and acquainted himself with how its crewmen have always kept its combat and technical equipment ready to go into action before watching navymen in training.
					
					 He set forth the tasks to be performed by the unit to bolster its combat capability.
					
					 Going round the service personnel's hall and combined service facilities of the unit, he learned about the political and ideological education of navymen and supply service.
					
					 He inspected Unit 158 of the KPA Navy.
					
					 He gave its navymen a pair of binoculars and an automatic rifle as souvenirs and had a photo session with them.
					
					 Making the rounds of a bedroom, education room, mess hall and various other places of the sub-unit of the unit, he took care of the living of the navymen as their real father would do.
					
					 After coming out to a navy port, he got aboard Torpedo Boat 1307 and guided tactical training.
					
					 He watched with keen attention navymen in training from its commanding post. He encouraged them, telling them to speed up and make bold maneuverability.
					
					 He praised the captain of the boat, patting him on his back for commanding it with skilful navigation while changing the course quickly and accurately. 
					
					 Praising the navymen who lined up on the prow deck after the end of the training, he had a picture taken with them.
					
					 He inspected the Command of Combined Unit 597 of the KPA Navy.
					
					 He had a photo session with its service personnel.
					
					 He first went round the room for education in the revolutionary history and the room devoted to its history.
					
					 The history of the development of the unit is recorded with feats which strikingly demonstrated the might of the KPA Navy by sinking or destroying a lot of enemy warships including the battle results unprecedented in the world history of naval battles KPA navymen achieved by sinking the U.S. imperialist heavy cruiser "Baltimore" with just four torpedo boats in the naval battle in Jumunjin during the Fatherland Liberation War. 
					
					 Looking at historic mementoes and data, he recalled with deep emotion the path of victory and glory covered by the combined unit.
					
					 The combined unit is a unit which has fully displayed patriotic devotion and popular heroism in the defence of the country and socialist construction for decades and performed proud feats in this course including the capture of the U.S. imperialist armed spy ship "Pueblo" which intruded into the territorial waters of the DPRK, he said, calling upon the service personnel of the combined unit to preserve this tradition and demonstrate the invincible might in devotedly defending the country in the future, too.
					
					 Going round military objects, operation study room, lecture room and library, he acquainted himself in detail with the unit's performance of duty.
					
					 He praised all the commanding officers and staff members for having prepared themselves to skillfully command naval operations and battles under any difficult situation by successfully building rooms for the study of operations so that they might deeply study and fully apply the Juche-based military strategic and tactical ideas and war methods of the WPK and conducting effective trainings to improve the ability to organize naval operations and battles and the commanding capability. 
					
					 The navy has a very important mission and role to play in the country bounded with seas on its three sides, he said, putting forward important tasks which would serve as guidelines for further bolstering the naval force.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends New Year's Cards to Foreign State Leaders
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends New Year's Cards to Foreign State Leaders
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un sent New Year's cards and messages to foreign political party and state leaders.
					 They included the president of China who doubles as the general secretary of the C.C., the Communist Party of China, the president of Laos who double as the general secretary of the C.C., the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, the presidents of Mongolia, Bangladesh, Sri Lanka and Turkmenistan, the king of Jordan, presidents of Uzbekistan, Iran, Vietnam and Belarus, the president and the head of state of Mali, the president of Tunisia, the chairman of the Mongolian People's Party,  the general chairman of the Central Directive Council of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle, the general secretary of the C.C., the Communist Party of India (Marxist), the general secretary of the C.C., the Communist Party of Vietnam and the chairwoman of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia. 
					
					 He also sent New Year's cards to the prime minister of Pakistan, the head of the Organization Department of the C.C., the Communist Party of China who is member of its Political Bureau and member of its Secretariat, the head of the International Liaison Department of the C.C., the CPC, the director general of the International Kim Il Sung Fund, the head of the State Academy Beryozka Dancing Troup of Russia Named after N.S. Nadezhdina, the head of the Russian State Academic People's Chorus Named after M. E. Pyatnichki, the head of the Academy Ensemble of the Interior Unit of the Russian Ministry of Interior, the head of the "Orchestra of the 21st Century", the governor of Amur Region, the mayor of Khabarovsk and the administrative governor of the Maritime Territory of Russia, the chairman of the Development Bank of the Mediterranean who doubles as the chairman of the Italian General Investment Group and the secretary general of the International Liaison Committee for Reunification and Peace in Korea.

articles.title: Koreans Enjoy First Full Moon
articles.content:
Koreans Greeting First Full Moon Day
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- February 6 is the first full moon day, one of the Korean people's folk holidays, according to lunar calendar.
					On the holiday they enjoy full moon, expressing their wishes. They also recollect last year and hope for good luck and bumper crops in the new year.
					
					 But this year's holiday is different. Seeing the full moon they are sorely missing leader Kim Jong Il and wishing him immortality. They are also determined to make redoubled efforts for the prosperity of socialist Korea.
					
					 Pak Ri Gil, a 59-year-old man living in Moranbong District, Pyongyang, told KCNA:
					
					 "On the holiday my family used to sing the song 'Bright Moon over My Homeland'. Singing the song we had hoped that the moon would brighten the way of leader Kim Jong Il's army inspection tour and that he would take rest even a little. 
					
					 But this evening I think of many moonlit nights he spent in his inspection tour for the prosperity of the country and the happiness of the people. I am missing him so much. I will remain true to his lifetime intention."
					
					Jong Chol Hun, a 54-year-old man living in Phyongchon District, said;
					
					 "All of the Korean people hope that everything will go well this year marking the 100th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the 70th birth anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 I and my family vow to keep the pledge we made before the bier of  Kim Jong Il by doing a fine job."

articles.title: Special Dishes on First Full Moon Day
articles.content:
Special Dishes on First Full Moon Day
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Dishes made of nine kinds of dried edible herbs are favorite ones taken by the Korean people on the first full moon day (January 15th of the lunar calendar), one of their folk holidays.
					 Nine kinds of dried edible herbs vary with locality.
					
					 Most of herbs are used for dishes. But dried radish slices, aralia shoots, lentinus edodes, osmund, broad bellflower roots, pumpkin slices and perilla leaves pickled with salt are most popular for the dishes.
					
					 People in Pyongyang prepare holiday dishes with red pepper leaves, barrenwort, bracken and osmund, while people in North and South Hamgyong provinces use broad bellflower roots, leopard plant and seaweed for dishes.
					
					 It has been told that if one eats the said dishes on the holiday when farming starts, he or she would enjoy double happiness, neither feeling heat too much in summer nor suffering from illness that year.
					
					 January 15 of lunar calendar this year is February 6.

articles.title: Boiled Rice with Four Other Staple Cereals
articles.content:
Boiled Rice with Four Other Staple Cereals
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Ogokbap (boiled rice admixed with four other staple cereals) is one of the dishes the Korean people enjoy on the January 15th of the lunar calendar (February 6 this year), one of the national holidays.
					 The five cereals used in ogokbap are different with times and locality, but rice, foxtail millet, kaoliang and red-bean are common cereals.
					
					 Besides the four common cereals, Phyongan and Hamgyong provinces used millet or barnyard grass, Hwanghae, Kyonggi and Chungchong provinces beans, Kangwon Province barley and Kyongsang Province glutinous rice. 
					
					 In some areas ogokbap has been prepared with four or six cereals.  
					
					 Rice, foxtail millet, kaoliang, millet and beans discovered in relics dating back to about 5,500 years ago show that the Korean people have produced rice and other cereals from more than 5,000 years ago.
					
					 According to the old book "Koryo History", the Korean people began to take ogokbap on the January 15th of the lunar calendar from over 1,000 years ago. 
					
					The ogokbap-taking custom reflects a desire of the people to have a bumper harvest of the five crops in the new year.
					
					 Ogokbap is good for arteriosclerosis, arthritis, neuralgia and rheumatism. It also helps improve stomach and spleen.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Turning Phase of Reunification
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends New Year's Cards to Foreign State Leaders
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un sent New Year's cards and messages to foreign political party and state leaders.
					 They included the president of China who doubles as the general secretary of the C.C., the Communist Party of China, the president of Laos who double as the general secretary of the C.C., the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, the presidents of Mongolia, Bangladesh, Sri Lanka and Turkmenistan, the king of Jordan, presidents of Uzbekistan, Iran, Vietnam and Belarus, the president and the head of state of Mali, the president of Tunisia, the chairman of the Mongolian People's Party,  the general chairman of the Central Directive Council of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle, the general secretary of the C.C., the Communist Party of India (Marxist), the general secretary of the C.C., the Communist Party of Vietnam and the chairwoman of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia. 
					
					 He also sent New Year's cards to the prime minister of Pakistan, the head of the Organization Department of the C.C., the Communist Party of China who is member of its Political Bureau and member of its Secretariat, the head of the International Liaison Department of the C.C., the CPC, the director general of the International Kim Il Sung Fund, the head of the State Academy Beryozka Dancing Troup of Russia Named after N.S. Nadezhdina, the head of the Russian State Academic People's Chorus Named after M. E. Pyatnichki, the head of the Academy Ensemble of the Interior Unit of the Russian Ministry of Interior, the head of the "Orchestra of the 21st Century", the governor of Amur Region, the mayor of Khabarovsk and the administrative governor of the Maritime Territory of Russia, the chairman of the Development Bank of the Mediterranean who doubles as the chairman of the Italian General Investment Group and the secretary general of the International Liaison Committee for Reunification and Peace in Korea.

articles.title: Repeal of Plan for Privatizing Railway Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Repeal of Plan for Privatizing Railway Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- The railway trade union under the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions held a meeting in Seoul on Saturday, demanding the authorities to give up their plan for privatizing the railway.
					 The speakers said that the privatization would grant privileges to the big businesses and reduce tens of thousands of railway workers to part-time workers, threatening their existence.
					
					 They urged the authorities to drop their plan for privatizing the railway.

articles.title: Nepalese Peace Prize Awarded to Three Commanders of DPRK
articles.content:
Nepalese Peace Prize Awarded to Three Commanders of DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- The Nepal Journalist Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Politics awarded Nepalese International Peace Prize to the three commanders of Mt. Paektu with due ceremony in Kathmandu on Feb. 1.
					 The participants laid floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The prize was handed over to the DPRK ambassador to Nepal.
					
					 At the ceremony Chairman of the Association Manju Ratna Sakya said that the DPRK and independent socialist power where the people have become its master were built thanks to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					
					 The undying feats they performed by making tangible contribution to the Korean revolution and human cause of independence would remain in history forever and be deeply cherished by the world people, he added.

articles.title: DPRK's New Year Editorial Carried by Overseas Koreans' Newspaper
articles.content:
DPRK's New Year Editorial Carried by Overseas Koreans' Newspaper
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Thongil, newspaper of Koreans in Uzbekistan, on Jan. 26 carried "Glorify this year 2012 as a year of proud victory, a year when an era of prosperity is unfolding, true to the instructions of the great General Kim Jong Il", a joint New Year editorial of Rodong Sinmun, Joson Inmingun and Chongnyon Jonwi, leading newspapers of the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Printed in Pakistan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Printed in Pakistan
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "On Some Questions in Understanding the Juche Philosophy" was brought out in booklet by the Victorial Publishing House of Pakistan on Jan. 30.
					 The work, published on April 2, Juche 63 (1974), clarifies that the Juche philosophy is a man-centered one as it raises from a new angle the fundamental question of philosophy with main emphasis on man and indicates a viewpoint and attitude towards the world and explains the aspects that distinguishes the Juche philosophy from a human philosophy.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Organizations of different countries and regional organization posted on their Internet homepages special write-ups on the 70th birth anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK on Jan. 26 carried an article titled "Great Man Kim Jong Il" with his photo.
					
					 Referring in detail to the feats of Kim Jong Il as the outstanding thinker and theoretician and the great master of leadership and independent politics, the article said that the world community is praising him as the distinguished great man.
					
					 The Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism on Jan. 30 in an article headlined "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Jong Il" said that he will always live in the hearts of the progressive mankind as the great leader in the present century along with his feats for the Korean revolution and global independence.
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea on Jan. 26 carried an article under the title "The Sky Cries, Too". The article introduced mysterious natural phenomena witnessed in the DPRK after he passed away unexpectedly.
					
					 The International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions on Jan. 27 posted articles praising his feats with photos of his revolutionary activities.

articles.title: S. African Group for Study of Progressive Ideas Meets
articles.content:
S. African Group for Study of Progressive Ideas Meets
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- An annual meeting of the Group for the Study of the Progressive Ideas of South Africa took place on Jan. 28.
					 The meeting reviewed last year's activities and discussed the measures for the group to more positively conduct its activities and expand its ranks this year.
					
					 Eddie Kekana, chairman of the group, in his report said the world progressive mankind suffered a great loss last year at the passing of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Global independence could unswervingly advance along the road of truth despite the complicated situation because Kim Jong Il successfully carried forward the revolutionary cause of Juche of President Kim Il Sung, he noted.
					
					 The future of global independence is bright and its victory is sure as there is the dear respected Kim Jong Un who is identical to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in the idea and trait, he stressed.
					
					 He called on the group to more positively conduct activities on the significant occasions in 2012 including the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Commemorated in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Commemorated in Foreign Countries
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Events to mark the 70th birth anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) were held in different countries.
					 They included a meeting and film show in Pakistan on Jan. 28 and a lecture in Benin on Jan. 30.
					
					 The chairman of the Pakistan Association for Self-Reliance Studies and other speakers highly praised the exploits performed by Kim Jong Il for the noble cause of ensuring the prosperity of the country and wellbeing of the people and peace and security of the world, adding that it is quite natural for progressive humankind and Juche idea followers to commemorate his birth anniversary. 
					
					 He would be always alive in the hearts of the Korean people and global progressive humankind forever and his exploits in the international working class movement and global independence would shine forever, they noted, and continued: 
					
					  The chairman and secretary general of the Benin National Committee for the Study of General Kim Jong Il's Works said Kim Jong Il pursued original Songun politics, putting forward the Korean People's Army as a mainstay of the defense capability for self-defence and a main force for building a thriving nation. He was, indeed, a peerlessly illustrious commander of Songun.
					
					 Socialism has won victory after victory in the DPRK and the invincibility of the Juche idea has been strikingly demonstrated worldwide despite the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces' persistent moves to stifle the DPRK for several decades thanks to the treasured sword of Songun provided by him.
					
					 The revolutionary cause of Juche is sure to triumph as long as the dear respected Kim Jong Un follows the Songun politics, they concluded.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Commemorated in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Commemorated in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Preparatory committees for commemorating the 70th birth anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il were formed on Jan. 30 and 31 in Malaysia, Cambodia and Karelia, Russia.
					 The director of the Dombo Enterprise Company of Malaysia and Viktor Yegorov, chairman of the Karelia-DPRK Friendship Association of Russia, were elected chairmen of the committees. Kong Sam Ol, deputy prime minister in charge of the Royal Palace of Cambodia, was also elected chairman of the preparatory committee at the instruction of the Cambodian king.
					
					 A letter to the dear respected Kim Jong Un was adopted at the ceremony for inaugurating the Malaysian preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committees decided to widely disseminate book "Kim Jong Il's Encyclopedia" and give wide publicity to his greatness and feats and organize colorful political and cultural events during the period from Feb. 1 to 29. 
					
					 Meanwhile, the international preparatory committee for commemorating his 70th birth anniversary and the preparatory committee of the Blagobeshensk, Russia, Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Idea were formed.

articles.title: US MD in Europe Targets Russia: Putin
articles.content:
US MD in Europe Targets Russia: Putin
 Moscow, February 5 (KCNA) -- Russian Prime Minister Vladimir Putin in a documentary recently produced by BBC TV said that the U.S. missile defense system in Europe is targeted against Russia.
					 NATO is refusing to submit a written legal guarantee that MD is not targeted against Russia, he noted, adding that radars capable of monitoring the territories of Russia as far as the Ural region and ground nuclear bases there are being deployed close to the Russian border.
					
					 The U.S. MD in Europe is precisely aimed at disabling Russia's missile and nuclear potentials, he said.

articles.title: Fidel Castro Calls for LatAm Unity in Opposition to FTA
articles.content:
Fidel Castro Calls for LatAm Unity in Opposition to FTA
 Havana, February 5 (KCNA) -- The leader of the Cuban Revolution, Fidel Castro, in his latest reflection called for Latin American unity in opposition to the Free Trade Agreements (FTA), sponsored by the United States in the region.
					 Fidel Castro described as disastrous the Free Trade Agreement the White House tries to impose on Latin America.

articles.title: Iran Will Not Yield to West' Pressure: Seyed Ali Khamenei
articles.content:
Iran Will Not Yield to West' Pressure: Seyed Ali Khamenei
 Tehran, February 5 (KCNA) -- Seyed Ali Khamenei, leader of the Islamic Revolution of Iran, on Feb. 3 said that Iran will never yield to the West's pressure to arrest Iran's nuclear development.
					 The threat and attack on Iran will do harm to the U.S. itself and sanctions will have no effect on Iran's resolution to continue nuclear development, he noted.
					
					 Iran will deal a threat at an appropriate time to the West's oil banning and war threat, he said.

articles.title: Africa Focus: Malawi President Warns External Interference
articles.content:
Africa Focus: Malawi President Warns External Interference
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Malawi President Bingu Wa Mutharika on Friday warned some western donors, the clergy and the country's civil society organizations (SCOs), not to interfere with his governing powers. He said this speaking at a parliamentary session.
					 There was foreign influence in the country that was working with the civil society in encouraging chaos, disobedience and lawlessness, he said. "Recently, some Western donors, some civil society and some religious leaders have acted as if they have the right to govern," he added.
					
					 He stressed that Malawi as a sovereign nation is not subservient or inferior to any systems prevailing elsewhere.

articles.title: Brazil to Boost Cooperation with Cuba
articles.content:
Brazil to Boost Cooperation with Cuba
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Brazilian President Dilma Rousseff emphasized the importance of cooperation with Cuba during her first official visit to the country.
					 "Cooperation between the two countries should be considered 'strategic,'" said Rousseff, adding Cuba has "an outstanding development in biotechnology field, while her country may guarantee a high technological capacity."
					
					 Enhancing the bilateral ties is the best way to tide over the U.S. blockade against Cuba, she said.

articles.title: Nigeria to Raise Petrol Refining Capacity
articles.content:
Nigeria to Raise Petrol Refining Capacity
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Nigerian President Goodluck Jonathan said on Thursday that his government was willing to give licenses to those interested in setting up refineries in the country, as part of the efforts to boost local refining of petroleum products.
					 The president said this during an audience with a delegation of investors from Brazil in Abuja, saying it is part of the overall effort by the government to raise the nation's petroleum refining capacity and reduce the importation of refined products.
					
					"We are willing to approve applications for refining licenses," he added.

articles.title: Sri Lanka Celebrates 64th Independence Day
articles.content:
Sri Lanka Celebrates 64th Independence Day
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Sri Lanka celebrated its 64th Independence Day with a variety of events on Saturday.
					 The main celebrations took place in Anuradhpura, about 233 km from capital Colombo, where President Mahinda Rajapaksa led the official event.
					
					 Following the president's address to the nation, a military parade of navy, air force, police and army took place with over 4,000 personnel participating. This was followed by a colorful cultural pageant with dancers and drummers.
					
					 A massive exhibition and smaller ceremonies took place around the country that day.

articles.title: Iran Refutes Report of UN As "Lies"
articles.content:
Iran Refutes Report of UN As "Lies"
 Tehran, February 5 (KCNA) -- Iranian Judiciary Chief Ayatollah Sadeq Amoli Larijani said on Thursday in a meeting that the recent report issued by the UN special rapporteur for human rights in Iran is full of lies.
					 The rapporteur had already issued false reports on the status of human rights in the Islamic Republic of Iran, he said. It is amazing that a rapporteur who is responsible for observing international legal rights has expressed such biased reports about Iran, he said.
					
					 There are numerous cases of human rights violations by western countries, the Judiciary chief said.
					
					 They invaded Iraq under pretext of weapons of mass destruction and massacred hundred of thousands of innocent civilians there but no one has ever asked them under what principles of human rights they occupied the country, he said.
					
					 The Islamic Republic of Iran is the most democratic country in the region, he said.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un felicita a los jefes de Estado y partido por el Ano Nuevo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un felicita a los jefes de Estado y partido por el Ano Nuevo
Pyongyang, 6 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente del partido, el Estado y el pueblo de Corea,         Kim Jong Un, envio las tarjetas y mensajes de felicitacion a los jefes de partido y Estado de varios paises con motivo del Ano Nuevo 101 (2012) de la Era Juche. 
					Entre los destinatarios, que recibieron tarjetas y mensajes, se distinguen el secretario general del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China y presidente de la Republica Popular China, el secretario general del CC del Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao y presidente de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao, el presidente de Mongolia, el presidente de la Republica Popular de Bangladesh, el presidente de la Republica Democratica Socialista de Sri Lanka, el presidente de Turkmenistan, el rey de Reino Hachemita de Jordania, el presidente de la Republica de Uzbekistan, el presidente de la Republica Islamica de Iran, el presidente de la Republica Socialista de Vietnam, el presidente de la Republica de Belarus, el presidente y jefe de Estado de la Republica de Mali, el presidente de la Republica Tunecina, el presidente del Partido del Pueblo de Mongolia, la presidenta del Consejo de Direccion Central del Partido Democratico de Lucha de Indonesia, el secretario general del Comite Central del Partido Comunista (Marxista) de la India, el secretario general del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Vietnam y la presidenta del Partido por la Paz y la Unidad de Rusia. 
					
					Entre las personalidades, que recibieron las tarjetas del Ano Nuevo, se destacan el premier de la Republica Islamica de Pakistan, el miembro del Buro Politico y del Secretariado y jefe del Departamento de Organizacion, del CC del Partido Comunista de China, el jefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del CC del PCCh, el presidente de la Fundacion Internacional Kim Il Sung, la jefa del Conjunto de Danza Academica Nacional Beriozka N. S. Nadezhdina de Rusia, el jefe del Coro Folclorico Academico Nacional M. E. Pyatnichki de Rusia, el jefe del Conjunto Artistico Academico de la Unidad del Ministerio del Interior de Rusia, el  jefe de la Orquesta del Siglo 21 de Rusia, el gobernador de Amur, el alcalde de Jabarovsk y el gobernador del Territorio Litoral, de la Federacion Rusa,  el presidente de la Central de Desarrollo del Mediterraneo y de la Central Financiera General de Italia y el secretario general del Comite Internacional de Enlace por la Reunificacion y la Pazen Corea.

articles.title: Instituida en Corea la Orden Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Instituida en Corea la Orden           Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 6 de febrero (ACNC) -- Segun el decreto fechado 3 del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, fue instituida la Orden     Kim Jong Il con motivo del 70o aniversario de su nacimiento.
					La orden se usara como condecoracion estatal a los funcionarios, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, los trabajadores, las unidades del EPC, los organos, las empresas y las organizaciones sociales y cooperativas que realicen especiales meritos en la lucha por cumplir la causa revolucionaria del Juche y la de construccion del Estado prospero socialista.
					
					La Orden Kim Jong Il es la maxima distincion de Corea al igual que la Orden Kim Il Sung.
					
					Tiene la forma de una estrella dorada de 67 mm de largo y 65 mm de ancho.
					
					En su centro hay un circulo oval bordeado por espigas doradas de arroz, en el cual aparece de relieve el retrato del Dirigente Kim Jong Il con amplia sonrisa.
					
					En la parte arriba hay la insignia del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y abajo se ve la bandera de la RPDC.
					
					En el reverso se leen la palabra "Orden             Kim Jong Il" y su numero y hay un alfiler para pegarla a la ropa.
					
					En la chapa de orden de color dorado de 33 mm de largo y 10 mm de ancho, hay una estrella en el centro y en su reverso, un alfiler.

articles.title: Instituido en Corea el Premio Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Instituido en Corea el Premio          Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 6 de febrero (ACNC) -- Segun el decreto fechado 3 del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, fue instituido el Premio     Kim Jong Il con motivo del 70o aniversario de nacimiento de este dirigente.
					El premio se usara para condecorar a los funcionarios y las unidades que hagan aporte especial al desarrollo de las ramas de ciencia, educacion, salud publica, literatura y arte, prensa e informacion y deporte del pais mediante la lucha energica por realizar los nobles anhelos del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					El Premio Kim Jong Il es el maximo de Corea al igual que el Premio Kim Il Sung.
					
					La medalla de oro del Premio tiene doce angulos y un diametro de 39 mm.
					
					Es bordeada por los rayos dorados que simbolizan la idea Juche y tiene en su centro un circulo de 24 mm de diametro interior y 28 mm de diametro exterior, en el centro del cual esta incrustada de relieve la imagen de Kim Jong Il con amplia sonrisa.
					
					En la parte abajo del circulo hay el laurel que simboliza la victoria y la gloria y en su parte superior aparecen las frutas de 0.8 mm de diametro que muestran los exitos logrados en la construccion del Estado prospero bajo la sabia guia del Dirigente.
					
					La medalla de oro esta conectada por el anillo dorado de adorno con la chapita dorada de 27 mm de ancho y 11 mm de largo y tiene una longitud total de 65 mm.
					
					En su reverso se leen las letras "Medalla de oro del Premio Kim Jong Il" y un alfiler para fijarla en la ropa.

articles.title: Instituido el Premio de Honor Juvenil Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Instituido el Premio de Honor Juvenil Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 6 de febrero (ACNC) -- En visperas del 70o aniversario del dia de nacimiento (16 de febrero) del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, fue instituido en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea el Premio de Honor Juvenil Kim Jong Il, de acuerdo con el decreto fechado 3 del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC. 
					El premio se usara como condecoracion estatal para las organizaciones, funcionarios y jovenes de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung que resulten ejemplares en la sagrada lucha por desarrollar el movimiento juvenil, conducido victoriosamente por el Dirigente, defender la patria y construir un Estado prospero socialista. 
					
					Es el maximo premio para la juventud coreana al igual que el Premio de Honor Juvenil Kim Il Sung. 
					
					La medalla del premio pone en relieve la imagen del Dirigente con amplia sonrisa dentro de un circulo dorado de 20 mm de diametro, colocado en la parte central de la bandera roja de 31 mm de largo y 23 mm de ancho. 
					
					En la parte inferior se ven 15 rayos, el lago Chon del monte Paektu y las inscripciones "Premio de Honor Juvenil Kim Jong Il" en una cinta de color azul de 20 mm de largo. A ambos lados aparecen los laureles dorados. 
					
					La bandera roja con la efigie del Dirigente con amplia sonrisa significa que los jovenes coreanos avanzan a pasos firmes por cumplir la causa revolucionaria del Juche apoyando la guia del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, y el lago Chon demuestra la continuacion de las brillantes tradiciones revolucionarias del Partido del Trabajo de Corea. 
					
					La cinta azul con inscripciones de "Premio de Honor Juvenil Kim Jong Il" y los laureles dorados hacen conocer la firme decision de la juventud coreana, unida compactamente en torno al Maximo Dirigente, de marchar al frente en el trabajo y la vida como verdaderos soldados de el. 
					
					En el reverso de la medalla se ven las letras "Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea". 
					
					La medalla esta acoplada por anillos con una chapita en forma de bandera tricolor de la RPDC de 30 mm de ancho y 6 mm de largo. 
					
					En el reverso de la chapita hay un alfiler para fijar la medalla a la ropa.

articles.title: Instituido Premio de Honor Infantil Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Instituido Premio de Honor Infantil Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 6 de febrero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del septuagesimo aniversario de natalicio del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, quedo instituido en Corea el Premio de Honor Infantil Kim Jong Il.
					Se publico el dia 3 el decreto correspondiente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					El premio se otorgara a los miembros ejemplares de la Union de Ninos de Corea en transmitir de generacion en generacion las imperecederas proezas del Dirigente Kim Jong Il acumuladas para el desarrollo de las organizaciones de la Union de Ninos de Corea y su gran amor dispensado para los miembros de la mencionada union, y en prepararse con firmeza como sucesores de la causa de la revolucion del Songun guardando en el profundo de sus almas el respetuoso nombre e imagen como sol del Dirigente.
					
					El premio es el maximo de los ninos coreanos junto con el Premio de Honor Infantil Kim Il Sung.
					
					En el Premio se distingue el retrato del Dirigente con amplia sonrisa grabado dentro del circulo oval dorado con 20 mm de diametro en el centro de la dorada estrella de cinco puntas con rayas doradas de 37 mm de largo y el 37 mm de ancho.
					
					Y en su debajo se ve el lago Chon del monte Paektu, la inscripcion "Premio de Honor Infantil Kim Jong Il" enclavada en la cinta de 20 mm de largo de forma de la bandera nacional y los laureles  dorados en ambos lados de la estrella de cinco puntas.
					
					La estrella de cinco puntas simboliza a la Union de Ninos de Corea que se arma con la gran idea Juche, defiende ideo-politicamente a costa de la vida al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un aun en cualesquier pruebas y avanza a pasos firmes por el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					El lago Chon del monte Paektu simboliza la voluntad de llevar adelante de generacion en generacion las brillantes tradiciones revolucionarias del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, y los laureles representan la determinacion de los miembros de la Union de Ninos de Corea que avanzan uniendose con firmeza en torno al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					
					La cinta de forma de la bandera nacional, en la cual se ve grabada la inscripcion "Premio de Honor Infantil Kim Jong Il" simboliza la decision de los miembros de la Union de Ninos de Corea quienes enaltecen altamente al Mariscal Kim Jong Il como eterno Sol del Juche, y se preparan siempre para la patria socialista guiada por el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					
					En el reverso de la insignia se ve la letra "Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea" y hay el alfiler para fijarlo en la ropa.
